How It Works

Four simple steps to never miss a sold-out gig again.

1

Message on WhatsApp

Send us a message like "Watch for Fred Again under 80". It takes just a few seconds.

2

We Confirm the Event

We search for matching events and show you the venue, date, and current ticket price.

3

Say "Yes" to Create

Confirm and your watch is live. We start monitoring ticket availability immediately.

4

Get Instant Alerts

The moment tickets become available or drop below your price, you get a WhatsApp notification.

Example Conversation

Watch for Fred Again under 80
Found: Fred Again - 3Arena, Dublin - March 15. Current price: 89.50. Watch for under 80?
Yes
Watch created! We'll alert you when tickets drop below 80. Checking continuously.

Ready to Try?

It takes 30 seconds to set up your first watch.

Start on WhatsApp

TicketWatch

Instant WhatsApp alerts when concert tickets become available in Ireland.
